column2: "It's only natural for Hunters to up their abilities by working together."
"Coordinated attacks take close teamwork that can only be learned through experience."
"Even I'm still learning, if you can believe that. That's why I want you to join me on this mission."
"We'll go down to Volcanic Caverns together. It'll make for some great teamwork practice!"

"<yellow>*This Client Order, on which you will have Ohza accompany you, will be easier to complete if you set a password in the \"Enter Party Info\" menu and select the \"Limit multiplayer requests from other parties\" option when accepting it.<c>"
